title: A little booke of Iohn Caluines concernynge offences whereby at this daye diuers are feared, and many also quight withdrawen from the pure doctrine of the Gospell, a woorke very needefull and profitable. Translated out of Latine into Englishe by Arthur Goldinge.
author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
publisher: By [H. Wykes for?] VVilliam Seres, dvvellyng at the weast ende of Powels, at the signe of the Hedghogge,
notes: Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: Iohn Caluine concerninge offences.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
